data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the winter monsoon and a broad band of clouds, it will be mainly cloudy and persistently cold over the coast of southern China today and tomorrow. The monsoon is expected to be replaced by a fresh to strong easterly airstream over the weekend. Temperatures will rise progressively over the coast of Guangdong, but it will still be cool in the morning. With the easterly airstream moderating gradually early to midweek next week, the weather will improve slightly over Guangdong.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260122","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy.
